title: Enhancing AI Tools for Research Synthesis and Customizable Project Planning
description: Opportunity to address user researcher Suzette Ballou's frustrations with stakeholders and developers by improving AI tools for research synthesis and customizing project planning to align with specific project goals and user needs.
